author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #38170

#### PR description:

Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs (tag name: [`L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_1_0_xml`](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_1_0_xml)) [[documented in CMSLITDPG-980]](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-980?focusedCommentId=4361810&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-4361810).

#### PR validation:

Relies on the validation done for the original PR (the HLT menus are currently the same in `master` and `CMSSW_12_4_X`).

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

#38170

Development of HLT menus for Run-3 pp data-taking operations.
title: Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_1_0_xml` [`12_4_X`]
